1.text: Combine the milk, pumpkin puree, and sugar.

2.text: Heat the milk mixture over medium heat.

3.text: Add in the pumpkin pie spice, vanilla extract, and coffee.
3.vid: /3/3d/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 3 Version 3.360p.mp4

5.text: Divide the latte between two mugs.

6.text: Heat the pumpkin puree and pumpkin pie spice in a small saucepan.
6.vid: /9/9d/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 6 Version 3.360p.mp4

7.vid: /e/e4/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 7 Version 3.360p.mp4

8.text: Stir in the milk and the vanilla extract.
8.vid: /e/ee/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 8 Version 3.360p.mp4

9.text: Blend the two together with a handheld blender.
9.vid: /2/29/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 9 Version 3.360p.mp4

10.text: Divide the espresso between two mugs.
10.vid: /5/5d/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 10 Version 3.360p.mp4

11.text: Pour the milk mixture into the mugs.

13.text: Garnish the lattes with the whipped cream.

14.text: Mix all of the ingredients, except for the coffee and cream.
14.vid: /d/d6/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.text: Cover the bowl with a sheet of plastic wrap.

16.text: Microwave the mixture until it is hot.
16.vid: /f/f6/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 16 Version 2.360p.mp4

17.text: Whisk the milk until it turns foamy.
17.vid: /b/b7/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 17 Version 2.360p.mp4

18.text: Pour the brewed coffee into a large mug.
18.vid: /1/1e/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 18 Version 2.360p.mp4

19.text: Pour the milk mixture into the mug.
19.vid: /7/7e/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 19 Version 2.360p.mp4

20.text: Garnish the latte with whipped cream.

21.text: Pour the strong, brewed coffee into a large, slow cooker.
21.vid: /0/0e/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 21 Version 2.360p.mp4

22.text: Add the milk and heavy whipping cream.
22.vid: /1/1b/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 22 Version 2.360p.mp4

23.text: Stir in the pumpkin puree, sugar, vanilla, and pumpkin pie spice.
23.vid: /f/f9/Make a Pumpkin Spice Latte Step 23 Version 2.360p.mp4

24.text: Cook the latte on HIGH for 2 hours.

25.text: Serve the lattes in large mugs.
